screen:
-= Info about application 'MailboxExists' =-
[Synopsis] Check to see if Voicemail mailbox exists
[Description] MailboxExists(mailbox[@context][,options]): Check to see if the specified mailbox exists. If no voicemail context is specified, the 'default' context will be used. This application will set the following channel variable upon completion: VMBOXEXISTSSTATUS - This will contain the status of the execution of the MailboxExists application. Possible values include: SUCCESS | FAILED
Options: (none)
